kickstart.post:
if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.csh` = 0; then echo 'setenv MODULEPATH /opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.csh fi if test `grep -c /opt/modulefiles/applications /etc/profile.d/modules.sh` = 0; then echo 'export MODULEPATH=/opt/modulefiles/applications:$MODULEPATH' >> \ /etc/profile.d/modules.sh fi
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4
#%Module1.0 set hdf4Home /opt/hdf4 set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set libsubdir [expr {$compiler} == {"gnu"} ? {""} : {"/$compiler"}] module-whatis "hdf4" module-whatis "Version: 2r4" module-whatis "Description: hdf4" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler" prepend-path PATH $hdf4Home/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $hdf4Home/lib$libsubdir prepend-path LIBPATH $hdf4Home/lib$libsubdir
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "2r4"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4/.version.2r4 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf4/.version
/bin/mkdir -m 0755 -p /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5
#%Module1.0 set hdf5Home /opt/hdf5 set compiler [expr ! [catch {exec which icc} ignored] ? {"intel"} : \ ! [catch {exec which pgcc} ignored] ? {"pgi"} : {"gnu"}] set libsubdir [expr {$compiler} == {"gnu"} ? {""} : {"/$compiler"}] module-whatis "hdf5" module-whatis "Version: 1.8.3" module-whatis "Description: hdf5" module-whatis "Compiler:$compiler" prepend-path PATH $hdf5Home/bin prepend-path LD_LIBRARY_PATH $hdf5Home/lib$libsubdir prepend-path LIBPATH $hdf5Home/lib$libsubdir
#%Module1.0 set ModulesVersion "1.8.3"
/bin/ln -s /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5/.version.1.8.3 \ /opt/modulefiles/applications/hdf5/.version
